Uses of Package
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.representationinformation

Packages that use info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.representationinformation
Package
Description
info.oais.infomodel.implementation
This module provides implementations of the classes defined in OAIS with minimum additions for the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation.
info.oais.infomodel.implementation.representationinformation
This module provides a number of classes which are used in the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation of Representation Information.
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces
This module provides interfaces defined in the OAIS Information Model.
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.representationinformation
This module provides a number of interfaces which are used in the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation of Representation Information.
  • Classes in info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.representationinformation used by info.oais.infomodel.implementation
    Class
    Description
    AcyclicDirectedGraph
    This interface provides methods which can be used to navigate a RepInfoNetwork.
    RepInfoCategory
    A classification of RepInfo to facilitate locating the kind of RepInfo wanted.
    RootVertex
    The unique root Vertex of the acyclic directed graph.
  • Classes in info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.representationinformation used by info.oais.infomodel.implementation.representationinformation
    Class
    Description
    AcyclicDirectedGraph
    This interface provides methods which can be used to navigate a RepInfoNetwork.
    DirectedEdge
    Each edge has exactly one Source Vertex and one Target Vertex.
    RepInfoAndGroup
    All the elements of a ReInfoAndGroup must be used together to be useful.
    RepInfoCategory
    A classification of RepInfo to facilitate locating the kind of RepInfo wanted.
    RepInfoGroup
    Group of RepresentationInformation, which includes the associated classification.
    RepInfoOrGroup
    The elements of a RepInfoOrGroup are alternatives.
    RepInfoUsage
    Simple use of RepresentationInformation.
    RootVertex
    The unique root Vertex of the acyclic directed graph.
    Vertex
    A Vertex points to zero or more other Vertexs (sic), and it is pointed to by at least one other Vertex, unless it is the RootVertex.
